content:
I'm so glad to hear that Luna is enjoying her new pet bed! It's great that you got it from Petco, and I'm sure she's appreciating the comfort and softness it provides. $40 is a great price for a high-quality pet bed, and I'm sure it was worth every penny.

It's wonderful that you're taking such good care of Luna and providing her with all the comforts she needs. Pets bring so much joy and companionship to our lives, and it's great that you're returning that love and care.

Now, let's get back to the pet camera discussion. Have you had a chance to look into any of the options I mentioned earlier? Do you have any specific questions or concerns about pet cameras that I can help with?
